entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quinte West
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
